Alfie Bass https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Alfie_Bass 0 Alfie Bass (born Abraham Basalinsky, 10 April 1916 – 15 July 1987) was an English actor. He was born in Bethnal Green, London, the youngest in a Jewish family with ten children; his parents had left Russia many years before he was born. He appeared in a variety of stage, film, television and radio productions throughout his career. Alfie_Bass ( born Abraham_Basalinsky , 10_April_1916 – 15_July_1987 ) was an_English_actor . He was_born in Bethnal_Green , London , the_youngest in a_Jewish_family with ten_children ; his_parents had_left Russia_many_years before he was_born . He appeared in a_variety of stage_,_film_,_television_and_radio_productions throughout his_career .
